p: Another method established by the University of Hong Kong to detect subgenus Sarbecovirusu uses N-gene screening assay followed by a confirmatory Orf1b assay. Positive patients should be considered as SARS-CoV2 confirmed cases, as none of the sarbecoviruses have been previously detected in humans, and SARS was eliminated in humans as the last reported human SARS case was detected in 2004 [ 33].
